content:
The ~direct.distributed. DistributedNode class is a specialized Panda3D distributed object enabling position and rotation functions, with network calls defined in direct.dc, requiring this file in the repository initialization.

Distributed Node

The ~direct.distributed.DistributedNode.DistributedNode class is a specialized distributed object and defines functions available from PandaNodes, such as position and rotation. Simply check the direct.dc file to see which network calls are available.

This DO can be used if the repository has been initialized with the direct.dc added to the dc files list.
